confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Sprint[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Matrix[/color] skill.
Higher levels of [color=title]Sprint[/color] offer small [color=title]speed increases[/color] while incrementally decreasing the base [color=title]recharge time[/color].

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Matrix[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The first upgrade to Sprint increases the [color=title]rate[/color] and [color=title]duration[/color] of your sprint by small amounts. It also reduces the [color=title]recharge time[/color] by 2 seconds.
texts.specs: [color=title]30%[/color] speed bonus for [color=title]3.5s[/color] (+10% for +0.5s) Recharges in [color=title]8 seconds[/color] (-2s)

confirm.header:
If you unlock Sprint, you will lose access to the [color=title]Matrix[/color] skill.
Future upgrades to Sprint will extend the duration for which you can sprint as well as shorten the recharge time.

texts.overview: The final upgrade to Sprint maximizes the [color=title]speed bonus[/color] and [color=title]duration[/color] of the skill. The [color=title]recharge time[/color] will also decrease by a small amount.
texts.specs: [color=title]50%[/color] speed bonus for [color=title]4.0s[/color] (+20% for +0.5s) Recharges in [color=title]6 seconds[/color] (-2s)

texts.overview: You have fully upgraded Sprint. You have the maximum possible [color=title]speed bonus[/color] and [color=title]duration[/color] of the skill.
